revised_title: Inundations, Monstrous Births, and Celestial Phenomena in 1708 Ireland
tldr: In 1708, Reverend Mr. W. Derham reported on various events in Ireland, including inundations, monstrous births, and celestial phenomena. He also observed the solar eclipse of September 3 and the lunar eclipse of September 18, 1708, providing detailed accounts of his findings.
scientific_discipline: Earth Sciences > Natural Disasters and Geology
